rooms.objective: Learn basic dash mechanics and reach the spring
hint_tiers: Press the dash button while moving in any direction to dash
You can dash in 8 directions (up, down, left, right, and diagonals)
Use the spring to bounce upward - time your jump as you hit it for extra height

rooms.objective: Collect the first strawberry using spring and dash
hint_tiers: Use the spring to gain height
Dash into the strawberry while airborne
Touch the ground after collecting to lock in the strawberry

rooms.objective: Drop down to collect strawberry and recover to wall
hint_tiers: Drop down from the platform above the strawberry
Dash into the wall immediately after grabbing it
Use wall climb and wall jump to get back to safety

rooms.objective: Collect flying strawberry without using dash
hint_tiers: This is a winged strawberry - dashing will scare it away
Use the platforms on the right side to get above it
Drop down carefully without dashing to collect it

rooms.objective: Navigate through traffic light blocks
hint_tiers: Traffic light blocks (green/red) toggle when you dash
Green blocks are solid, red blocks let you pass through
Plan your dashes to make a safe path through

rooms.objective: Use spring to navigate spikes and collect strawberry
hint_tiers: Jump and dash upward to reach the middle landing - grab the wall if needed
Use the spring to hop over the spikes
Fall downward and use your dash to collect the strawberry and land safely

rooms.objective: Use traffic light lift to collect strawberry
hint_tiers: Stand on the traffic light lift on the right
When it flings you up, dash diagonally to the upper left
Grab the strawberry in the upper left corner

rooms.objective: Break through wall and navigate geared platform puzzle
hint_tiers: Look for a breakable block in the lower right corner of the room with Strawberry #5
Dash through it to reveal a hidden area, then drop through the spikes carefully
Dash to the geared platform, ride it to the strawberry, then jump back and dash through the floor above to escape

rooms.objective: Learn disappearing platform mechanics
hint_tiers: Disappearing platforms vanish shortly after you touch them
Move quickly but don't panic
You can dash mid-air to extend your reach if needed

rooms.objective: Meet Theo and continue forward
hint_tiers: This is a story beat - take your time
Theo is another climber you'll meet throughout the game
Continue to the right after the conversation

rooms.objective: Learn to use dash crystals (refill orbs)
hint_tiers: Green crystals restore your dash in mid-air
Touch the crystal to refill, then dash again immediately
These allow you to chain multiple dashes together

rooms.objective: Find hidden area above Theo and navigate spike gauntlet
hint_tiers: From the room with a green crystal in the center, climb up the left wall to find a hidden passage
Watch out for the spring beneath spikes - hop over it carefully
Use the second spring to launch toward the wall, grab it, jump over spikes, and hit the green crystal to dash to safety

rooms.objective: Break through hidden wall to find strawberry
hint_tiers: In the room with the green crystal in the center, go right instead of up
Dash above the crystal to fall on it and regain your dash
Instead of jumping up, dash through the brown rock on the right to reveal a hidden strawberry

rooms.objective: Find secret passage and navigate double geared platform puzzle
hint_tiers: In the room with two geared platforms, use the upward platform to reach high
Jump and dash into the small crevice next to the up arrow sign - this reveals a passage
Navigate carefully through the geared platform gauntlet to reach the strawberry in the upper left

rooms.objective: Locate and collect the hidden Crystal Heart
hint_tiers: The Crystal Heart is hidden in the Crossing section
Look for unusual wall patterns or suspicious gaps
You'll need to chain multiple dash crystals to reach it - practice your aerial movement

rooms.objective: Learn falling platform mechanics
hint_tiers: Falling platforms shake before dropping - move quickly
You can dash to safety if you react fast enough
Some platforms fall faster than others - watch for visual cues

rooms.objective: Collect the B-Side cassette tape
hint_tiers: The cassette is located in the Chasm section surrounded by cassette blocks
Cassette blocks alternate between solid and intangible in rhythm with the music
Time your movements to the beat - blue blocks are solid when the beat hits

rooms.objective: Navigate final section with all mechanics combined
hint_tiers: This section combines everything you've learned
Take it slow and plan each dash before using it
Remember that dash crystals refill your dash - use them strategically

rooms.objective: Reach the chapter end goal
hint_tiers: You're almost there! The end is in sight
Use all your skills to climb the final section
Touch the heart symbol to complete the chapter

rooms.objective: Finish Chapter 1
hint_tiers: Congratulations on completing Forsaken City!
You've learned the core mechanics that will carry you through the rest of the game
Consider going back for strawberries you missed, or try the B-Side for a greater challenge!
